project.description: Kuali-research-docker is a git repository that contains bash scripts for building docker images from kuali module source code and deploying them as containers in specified environments. This job pulls the kuali-research-docker repo into the /tmp directory.

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: GIT_REPO_URL
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description: The git repository from which this job will pull the docker build context directories and scripts to run the docker commands.

secureScript.script: def url = "git@github.com:bu-ist/kuali-research-docker.git" return "<input type='text' readonly=true name='value' style='width:400px;font-family:monospace;' value='" + url + "'>"

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' name='value' value='error' style='width:400px;' disabled=true>"

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: GIT_BRANCH
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description: The git branch from which this job will pull the docker build context directories and scripts to run the docker commands.

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' name='value' value='error' style='width:400px;' disabled=true>"

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: ROOT_DIR
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description:
Pull the docker scripts to this directory.
Defaults to the workspace directory of this job

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' name='value' value='error' style='width:400px;' disabled=true>"

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
[ "$VERBOSE" == false ] && set +x
# Fix affects of active choices reactive parameter bug. The variables trail with added comma. GIT_BRANCH=$(echo "$GIT_BRANCH" | sed 's/,//g') GIT_REPO_URL=$(echo "$GIT_REPO_URL" | sed 's/,//g') ROOT_DIR=$(echo "$ROOT_DIR" | sed 's/,//g')
[ -z "$ROOT_DIR" ] && ROOT_DIR="$WORKSPACE"
source /var/lib/jenkins/cli-credentials.sh java -jar \ /var/lib/jenkins/jenkins-cli.jar \ -s http://localhost:8080/ \ build 'pull-docker-build-context' \ -v -f \ -p VERBOSE=${VERBOSE} \ -p GIT_REPO_URL=${GIT_REPO_URL} \ -p GIT_BRANCH=${GIT_BRANCH} \ -p TARGET_DIRECTORY=$ROOT_DIR
